Reviews.Title: “Budget Hotel – You get what you pay for”
Reviews.Author: pateshko
Reviews.Content: booked budget hotel trip rome extremely convenient location train station location didn’t disappoint able hop trains various buses restaurants choose train station cheap eats budget hotel surprised jacuzzi tub bathroom – pay satisfied quality based price included breakfast morning

Reviews.Title: “Lol”
Reviews.Author: Paul D
Reviews.Content: oh god mess believe called hotel sleeping arrived couldnt believe building 4 hotels building short mess decorative option brill time rome wont hotel day budget paid didnt safety boxes leave valuables chance leaving money gear beds seriously dont expect sum disappointed arrival location nice eat close stay laugh pay wish

Reviews.Title: “Worst Hotel in Rome”
Reviews.Author: cath353
Reviews.Content: placed hotel initial hotel reservation secured trying bad situation entered hotel mind unfortunately continuation nightmare hotel kept slightest toilet broken wires hanging walls shower flithy stage nights sleep start fresh morning impossible camp style beds sleeping mat floor imagine 1 shacks look abandoned decided morning look hotel breakfast paid receive bright hotel location ten mins train station city nice bars restaurants returned hotel evening check retrieve bags horrified guests settling checked bags personal belongings including passports damaged stolen hotel apologise unprofessional light word safety issue recommend hotel worst enemy

Reviews.Title: “GROSS”
Reviews.Author: Brent K
Reviews.Content: stayed 15 16th days european tour covering 4 countries 6 cities tried pick moderate mid range 3 star hotels knowing except sleep hotel close else stayed entire duration trip horrific dirty run dark lights hallways shower door broke glued mold shower bathroom mirror broke hair dryer covered black tape hole ceiling gain access ac unit list am complain hotel time write review hotel life absolutley terrible

Reviews.Title: “Below our expectations”
Reviews.Author: msamaha8
Reviews.Content: arrived tre stelle hotel flight rome definitely disappointed arrangements hotel didnt look nearly nice pictures website bed window view overlooked broken alley door shut guest echo loudly building hard sleep night bright cleaned everyday friendly staff price pretty decent hotel blocks bustrain terminal able rome easily id recommend using hotel youre willing conditions reduced price seek hotel return rome

Reviews.Title: “Very good hotel for this price!!!”
Reviews.Author: SonjaS85
Reviews.Content: hotel price cheap staff friendly helpfull clean location trip read comments little bit suspicious scared arrived pleasantly surprised bed window couldnt didnt day light didnt bother air condition time day outside sightseeing rome recommend

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel for this price”
Reviews.Author: esbaba
Reviews.Content: price pay realy hotel bathroom clean beds maybe little bit hard youre staff friendly breakfast realy dont understand complains dont pay lot money hotel luxery pay television chanel internet rome beautiful city television rome stay hotel

Reviews.Title: “Worst Hotel in Rome”
Reviews.Author: WesAustralia
Reviews.Content: welcome rome unless staying tre stella 3 star offered delightful views garbage broken aircons alley scare hardened gypsy towels thin bed sheet broken cistern mould ive seen shower disinfect scrub mention smell rotten sewage smell suffocating stay tre stella

Reviews.Title: “God Awful! Do not stay here!”
Reviews.Author: strux
Reviews.Content: negative review written trip advisor hotel tre stelle horrible filthy mildew mold shower disgusting lighting terrible toowith lights dim couldnt read book tv channel satellite beds thin springy mattresses glorified cots reception helpful internet advertised disturbing absolutely security easily walk street passports kept cubbies plain view easy steal overall hotel tre stelle location subway stop 5 blocks termini train station friendly women breakfast

Reviews.Title: “Do not believe there web site pictures!”
Reviews.Author: 3starsstinks
Reviews.Content: western building corner price nice hotels web site nice dumps funiture chipped broken believe web site photos bathroom smelled sewer fix hotel pre pay

Reviews.Title: “A good place for the offered money”
Reviews.Author: kkamal
Reviews.Content: staff friendly clean bath shower breakfast simple start day hotel 78 minutes termini railway station walk colosseum 2025 minutes walk main locations town bus metro station near termini visit vatican nice stay tre stelle hotel offered money thank tre stella
